It is pretty short. Around 28 miles short. The map is an older one from the 60's.
This is the Eisenhower interstate map, so it's information is only accurate up to the 1960s. 805 is a bypass of 5, and wasn't completed until the 1970s.
Thanks to /u/SirHawkwind for the info.
